title.jp: Taiyou no Katamuita Kono Sekai de - Broken Chronograph

synopsis:
Willem Kmetsch lives life as an outcast, like a dead man walking, until he happens to land a job as the caretaker of some rather "special" weapons.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.en: In the Forest Above the Skies -late autumn night’s dream-
title.jp: Sora no Ue no Mori no Naka no - Late Autumn Night's Dream

synopsis:
Chtholly's bombshell leaves Willem shaken, as he struggles to come to terms with the nature of the "special weapons."

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.en: Once This Fight is Over -starry road to tomorrow-
title.jp: Kono Tatakai ga Owattara - Starry Road to Tomorrow

synopsis:
Having learned about Chtholly's impending fate, Willem tries to come up with an alternate plan, much to her chagrin.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.en: Those Who Do Not Return and Those Who Are Waiting -dice in pot-
title.jp: Kaeranu Mono to, Machitsuzuketa Monotachi - Dice in Pot

synopsis:
Having sent his charges into battle, Willem finds the distraction he so badly needs in the form of a visit to cultural hotpot Corna di Luce.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.en: Everyone, In the Name of Justice -from dawn till dusk-
title.jp: Dare mo Kare mo ga, Seigi no Na no Moto ni - From Dawn Till Dusk

synopsis:
Phyracorlybia details her request to Limeskin, who refuses and asks Willem for a favor of his own.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.en: The Past That Doesn’t Disappear, The Future that Disappears -no news was good news-
title.jp: Kienai Kako, Kieteiku Mirai - No News Was Good News

synopsis:
Willem learns a lot from Souwong and makes a stand. Meanwhile, Chtholly continues to hear the voices in her head...

(Source: Crunchyroll)

The warehouse has to deal with the ramifications of Chtholly's condition. At the same time, things begin to unravel on the surface.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.en: Even if the Sun Falls -slight light, slight hope-
title.jp: Izure Sono Hi wa Ochiru Toshitemo - Slight Light, Slight Hope

synopsis:
As the situation on the surface continues to simmer, Chtholly struggles to come to terms with her new life.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.en: Even if the Future Can’t be Seen -moonlit sorcery-
title.jp: Tatoe Mirai ga Mienakute mo - Moonlit Sorcery

synopsis:
Things continue to get worse for Chtholly, who bravely decides to live in the moment. Meanwhile, the rescue operation to the surface finally begins.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.jp: Ima Kono Toki no Kagayaki wo - My Happiness

synopsis:
Chtholly helps out around the base as his secretary and gains the adulation of everyone there. Willem, on the other hand, starts having doubts about some unanswered questions after meeting Nopht and Rhantolk.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.en: Please, Do Not Forget -evidence of existence-

synopsis:
The situation on the surface heats up as a massive cave is found beneath Gomag City, and lying there is something very unexpected.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.en: The Happiest Girl in the World -Chtholly-
title.jp: Sekai de Ichiban Shiawase na Onnanoko - Chtholly

synopsis:
A desperate battle unfolds upon the Saxifraga as it tries to escape the attack of timere. Chtholly, clinging to the last pieces of emotions she still possesses, decides to fight.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
